instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL: yarn add framer-motion lucide-react recharts sonner clsx tailwind-merge @radix-ui/react-slot
SETUP: Configure tailwind.config.js to use the 'Toxic Wealth' color palette defined in colors section.
FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
LAYOUT: For the Dashboard, strictly follow the 'Control Room' grid. No scrolling on the main dashboard view if possible - make it fit the viewport like a trading terminal.
COMPONENTS: Do not use rounded corners (rounded-none) for a sharper, more financial/technical look.
MOTION: Use framer-motion for entrance animations. Stagger children in lists.
CHARTS: Use Recharts. Style them with the 'Toxic Lime' (#BDFF00) for positive trends and 'Destructive Red' (#FF2A00) for negative.
TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Avoid gradients for backgrounds, use them only for subtle glows or text accents.
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds, use the defined #020402.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast. Use the 'text.secondary' color for labels, never opacity.
Create a 'Layout' component that handles the sidebar/header structure for the dashboard.
